# terraform_app_owner (Resource)

AppOwner Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "terraform_app_owner" "my_app_owner" {
  app_id = "...my_app_id..."
  user_ids = [
    "...",
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_id` (String)

### Optional

- `user_ids` (List of String) The user_ids field for the users to set as an owner of the app.
